title: EpicEats
contents: A food ordering and restaurant management system with table booking, order tracking, and staff management. Built using Angular (frontend) and Spring Boot (backend), with MySQL for structured data handling.

title: iCET EVO Planing Project
contents: Worked on a mid-scale system as part of our course at iCET. I was assigned as the PMK for our feature. While I didn’t fully dive into the depths of the PM role, I got a top-level view and a feel for how planning and coordination works. Our lecturer guided me through most of it, so I wasn't alone in the process.

title: LynxViz.JS
contents: A handcrafted JavaScript animation library offering fine-grained control over animations. Includes built-in math and geometry utilities to make programmatic animations easier and more precise.

title: ClothifyStore
contents: A desktop app for managing clothing store operations, built with JavaFX. Includes inventory tracking, report generation using JasperReports, user-defined storage paths, and full config control via local files.

title: ChessAdvanced-WebSocket
contents: A minimalist online chess game where two players can compete in real-time using WebSockets. Built entirely with raw JavaScript—no frameworks, just logic.

title: HuntFlow
contents: A top-down 2D survival game where players explore an open world, collect resources, and race against time to meet their objectives. Solo mode now—multiplayer's cooking for the future.

title: Arduino WebSocket Bridge
contents: A hands-on IoT practice project connecting Arduino to the web using WebSockets. Control hardware like LEDs remotely in real-time, and learn the magic of software-hardware synergy.

title: Mos Burgers – POS System
contents: A full-stack Point of Sale system built for a burger shop. Handles everything from order taking to backend processing.
